notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme under Grant Agreement No 760928 (BIORIMA—BIOmaterial RIsk MAnagement). Further, FCT (Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia)/MCTES (Ministério da Ciência e Tecnologia do Ensino Superior) is acknowledged for the financial support to CESAM (UIDP/50017/2020+UIDB/50017/2020).
